34 
35 class LineBuffer : public std::streambuf {
36 
37 public:
38  int readLine(std::ifstream &fileHandle);
39  void copyLine(std::string *line) const;
40 
41 protected:
42  LineBuffer();
43 
44 private:
45  static const int CHUNK_SIZE = 1024;
46 
47  std::vector<char> m_buffer;
48 
49 };
50 
51 class LineStream : protected LineBuffer, public std::istream {
52 
53 public:
54  LineStream();
55 
56  int readLine(std::ifstream &fileHandle);
57 
58  using LineBuffer::copyLine;
59 
60 };
61 
62 }
